DOC.brief_summary: This study aim test plasma exposure PF-05089771 formulation use phase II trial ( capsule ) .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability With PF-05089771 Capsule Versus Oral Dispersion
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Females must nonchildbearing potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative , indicate subject inform pertinent aspects trial . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal ( i.e recurrent uric nephrolithiasis ) , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy )
